text: Yusuf Kironde Lule (10 April 1912 - 21 January 1985) was a Ugandan politician. He was the President of Uganda. He served as president from 13 April and 20 June 1979. His name is sometimes spelled Yusufu. Lule died on 21 January 1985 at Hammersmith Hospital in London of kidney failure. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Presidents of Uganda
title: Yusuf Lule
